thread.title: Excellent hotel in a strategic way to visit the city! Highly recommended!
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in a strategic way to visit the city! Highly recommended! - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Carolina o
title: Excellent hotel in a strategic way to visit the city! Highly recommended!
text:
This hotel is located in one of the most beautiful place of Paris, near the Arc de Triomphe. And when I write near I mean is 1 minute far from it by foot! From the terrace of my room I had the most wonderful of the Arc... it really left me breathless. Lot of tasty restaurants are all around the hotel and the Avenue des Champs-Élysées is 5 minute far always by foot. The RER is in front of the hotel like the taxis stop.
The room are really big and bright with a tipical French furnishing, really elegant and sophisticated.
The hotel team is really prepared and helpful.
The hotel has a restaurant inside.
I highly recommended this hotel!
Room Tip: Ask a room with Arc de Triomphe view See more room tips
